document_data.name: Gaze Screen
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gaze screen''''' was a spell that provided a defence against certain spells.
document_data.Effects: This spell protected a targeted creature from effects and spells that relied on eye contact. When cast, a shimmering area appeared before the creatures eyes. This mirror-like area followed the creature and did not effect vision. However, ''gaze screen'' only provided protection about 50% of the time.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
